vote.motion-en: That this Committee should proceed with the motion proposed to be moved by a member under paragraph 31A of the Establishment Subcommittee Procedure (Motion No. 2)

vote.motion-ch: 委員根據《人事編制小組委員會會議程序》第39A段動議於其後就相同的議程項目下的任何議案或待議議題進行點名表決時，委員會須在點名表決鐘聲響起一分鐘後立即進行各該點名表決
vote.motion-en: Motion moved by a member under para 39A of the ESC Procedure that in the event of further divisions being claimed in respect of any motions or questions under the same agenda item, the Committee do proceed to each of such divisions immediately after the division bell has been rung for one minute
